title: HackFusion
description: HackFusion is our flagship national-level hackathon, bringing together top tech talent for an intense 36-hour coding marathon. Participants collaborate in teams to tackle real-world challenges, creating innovative solutions under the guidance of industry experts. This high-energy event is more than just a competitionâ€”it's a platform for innovation, networking, and driving meaningful technological change.

title: Info Session
description: The Open House Meet served as a platform for members of the SWAG Developer's Club and Google Developer's Club to connect with new First Year students. The event provided an opportunity for students to explore their interests in technology and network with seniors interested in coding and software development.

title: Introduction to Open Source and Build with AI
description: The Version Control, Open Source Contribution, and AI Workshop was successfully conducted with enthusiastic participation from students and professionals. The workshop was organized by GDG on Campus: SGGSIE&T and focused on enhancing the participants' understanding of essential topics such as Version Control, Open Source Development, and the revolutionary potential of Artificial Intelligence.The event consisted of several hands-on sessions, discussions, and Quiz opportunities, making it a highly interactive and engaging experience for all attendees.

title: Tech Winter Break GDG On Campus
description: The Android Development Workshop was successfully conducted with enthusiastic participation from students and professionals. The workshop was organized by SWAG Developers Club and GDG on Campus SGGSIE&T focused on enhancing the participants' understanding of essential topics such as Android Development. Hands-on experience in building Android apps. Learn the fundamental of Android Studio and Kotlin/Java. Designing UI WITH XML. Tips and tricks from industry experts. A chance to collaborate with like-minded peers. The event consisted of several hands-on sessions, discussions, and Quiz opportunities, making it a highly interactive and engaging experience for all attendees

title: HackFusion 2.0
description: Registration for Hackathon will start from 10th Jan,2025
